title: "Leveraging Deep Learning to Facilitate Fish Counts"
excerpt: "In the Pacific Northwest, salmon are vital to commerce and to the marine ecosystem, and fish population estimates are key factors in many policy decisions. Current methods require trained biologists to observe the fish passing a viewing window and manually record the fish count on a daily basis."
